text.section: A person may not knowingly make or cause to be made a false statement or report in an application or document submitted to the Authority under this part.

A person may not knowingly make or cause to be made a false statement or report to influence an action of the Authority under this part:
on an application for assistance; or
affecting bonding assistance whether or not the assistance has been extended.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or a fine not exceeding $1,000 or both.
